about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: As Gölbahçe Facilities, we are here to create unforgettable moments in the heart of nature

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Starting our journey in 2008, we set out with the goal of preserving natural beauty in the heart of Istanbul and creating a space where our guests can spend peaceful and enjoyable time.
story.paragraph2: Today, with over 15 years of experience, we have become a place where families, couples, and friend groups create unforgettable memories. With our nature-respecting, sustainable tourism approach, we carry the responsibility of leaving a clean environment for future generations.
story.paragraph3: Our mission is to offer a natural escape point for everyone who wants to get away from the stress of the city, creating unforgettable experiences by blending traditional Turkish hospitality with modern comfort.

nature.title: Natural Beauty

hero.title: Start your day with a fresh breakfast by the lake!

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: At Gölbahçe, we believe that a great coffee experience is about more than just brewing. It’s the cozy atmosphere, warm hospitality, and delicious treats that accompany every sip. Our café is a sanctuary where you can escape the daily hustle, enjoy good company, aromatic coffee, and the simple pleasures of delightful pastries.

whatWeHave.title: What We Offer
whatWeHave.subtitle: Our menu, prepared with the finest ingredients and a passion for flavor, offers enchanting coffee creations, freshly baked goods, and delicious snacks.
